alert.note: Alert for Pulaski (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 15 at 7:49AM CDT until May 18 at 12:46AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Springfield MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri... Big Piney below Fort Leonard Wood -East Gate affecting Pulaski County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING TO EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Piney below Fort Leonard Wood - East Gate. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning to early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, water at the lower TA 250 Training Ground is two feet deep. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 AM CDT Monday the stage was 5.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 13.0 feet early Wednesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
